front.title: The application/smil and application/smil+xml Media Types

abstract.t: This document specifies the Media Type for versions 1.0, 2.0 and 2.1 of the Synchronized Multimedia Integration Language (SMIL 1.0, SMIL 2.0, SMIL 2.1). SMIL allows integration of a set of independent multimedia objects into a synchronized multimedia presentation.
